      • topTerms

        public TopTerms topTerms​(org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet filter)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Count of occurrences by term for a subset of the index, defined as a BitSet. The return dictionary is not sorted. Contrasted scores are available by the method scores() in the dictionary.
        Parameters:
        filter -
        Returns:
        A dictionary of terms with diffrent stats.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
